Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25173 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.18-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-25173 affecting package moby-containerd for versions less than 1.6.18-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-containerd is earlier than 1.6.18-2, affected by CVE-2023-25173
